column4: any reported problems with jaunty kicking people out of x? its happened with gnome, xfce4 and kde4 and i dont get any error. It just kicks me back out. Could it be a fast user switching action?
ATI and NVIDIA do NOT have drivers that support the version of Xorg in jaunty
i read something about that, i would be fine not using the nvidia for now if a generic would work. I have an nvidia 8600
you can try driver nv or even vesa for regression testing
